name: Rusty Gaillard
what_you_do: Breck School is an Episcopal, independent, college-preparatory day school that enrolls students of diverse backgrounds in grades preschool through twelve.
who_you_serve: Breck School serves students and families seeking a college-preparatory education in a diverse and inclusive environment.
